\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w gave|strong="H8248"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, every \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* being different, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, freely \w given|strong="H8248"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wives \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Media|strong="H4074"\w*, \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w*, \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* king's \w captains|strong="H8269"\w*. \w So|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w much|strong="H1697"\w* shame \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w pleasing|strong="H2895"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w order|strong="H1697"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w laws|strong="H1881"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Persians \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* changed, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*; \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w*.
